catchgame

Class CatchServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • catchgame.CatchServer

  • public class CatchServer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class Handles requests from clients for logging in, making new accounts and extracting SeaCreatures from the Ocean.
    Author:
    Nils Johnson, Matt Roberts

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  CatchServer.HandleNewRequestsTask
      Listens for initial requests to login or make new accounts.
      (package private) class  CatchServer.HandleServerSideGameControl
      Communicates between CatchServer and GameControl during a game, and is designed to be given to a thread so that this communication can occur freely while the rest of the program runs.
      private class  CatchServer.LaunchDbManipulatorHandler
      Action for creating anew DatabaseManipulator object.
      private class  CatchServer.MakeFrequencyHistogramAction
      Action event that creates a new Frequency Histogram object and associated GUI.
      private class  CatchServer.ShutdownServerHandler
      Right now this action is a stub that just says the user has tried to shut down the server
